function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited examples of institutionalizing participatory approaches in developing countries with limited resources and weak institutional support.","Impact":"Ineffective VBD control, lack of community involvement, and slow progress in disease mitigation.","Mitigation":"Providing training and resources to local organizations, building institutional support, and empowering community leadership.","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, participatory technology, and capacity-building tools.","People":"Communities in developing countries, local organizations, community leaders, and stakeholders.","Owner":"Local authorities, international organizations, NGOs, and development agencies."},{"Description":"Inequalities at the local level and gatekeepers silencing community groups from participating and having a voice.","Impact":"Lack of representation, unaddressed community health concerns, and slow progress in disease control.","Mitigation":"Addressing power structures, promoting inclusivity, and empowering marginalized community groups.","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, communication tools, and data-driven decision-making systems.","People":"Marginalized community groups, local leaders, and community stakeholders.","Owner":"Community leaders, local authorities, and NGOs."},{"Description":"Long-term collaboration and stakeholder engagement required for successful disease mitigation initiatives.","Impact":"Slow progress in disease suppression, lack of community ownership, and ineffective stakeholder participation.","Mitigation":"Sequential stakeholder meetings, capacity-building programs, and promotion of community ownership.","Technologies":"Project management tools, community engagement platforms, and capacity-building technology.","People":"Stakeholders, community leaders, and local organizations.","Owner":"Community leaders, local authorities, and international organizations."}]}
